arStrings.szText: Icons on the map indicate {c_highlight}active Whispers{/c} and are only available for a limited amount of time.
Each Whisper rewards a number of {c_highlight}Grim Favors{/c} upon completion.
You can track how many Grim Favors you have from the Map. When the bar is full, return to the {c_highlight}Tree of Whispers{/c} to claim a {c_highlight}valuable cache{/c} of your choice.
